SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Katie Spence’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope society sees children as inventors, artists, and writers.  Children are the future…”

– Ms. Katie Spence, Kindergarten & Learning Support Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/society-sees-children-inventors-artists-writers/
